thread.title: Accessible trail to open at Hawk Mountain
thread.title_full: Accessible trail to open at Hawk Mountain

title: Accessible trail to open at Hawk Mountain
locations: Hawk Mountain Craig George Jacqueline Dormer
text:
Accessible trail to open at Hawk Mountain Craig George Jacqueline Dormer / AP Craig George, director of advancement at Hawk Mountain Sanctuary, takes in the view from the South Lookout on the ADA-compliant grade Accessible Trail that leads visitors to the South Lookout at Hawk Mountain Sanctuary in Kempton. Craig George, director of advancement at Hawk Mountain Sanctuary, takes in the view from the South Lookout on the ADA-compliant grade Accessible Trail that leads visitors to the South Lookout at Hawk Mountain Sanctuary in Kempton. (Jacqueline Dormer / AP) Now almost anyone can reach Hawk Mountain's South Lookout. 
Hawk Mountain enters a new age of accessibility with the opening Sunday, July 26, of its first Accessible Trail to the South Lookout. The trail features a slope of less than 8.3 percent, which falls below the federal guidelines for national parks.
